Thank you for your interest in using the PRIO-GRID package in your work.

PRIO-GRID is an open-source initiative to survey, collect, and provide easy access to the wealth of open sub-national data relevant for conflict research and political science.

### How to install and load the PRIO-GRID package 

The first time you want to use the PRIO-GRID package, make sure to install it to your package library first.

```{r}

install.packages("renv")
renv::install("prio-data/priogrid")

```
